html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-05842023-06-16JUS
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations (Schedule XVIII)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS (SCHEDULE XVIII) in order to expand the list of offences contained in the Commercial Vehicle Drivers Hours of Service Regulations relating to driving hours, off-duty time between work periods, preparation of reports, or the regular presentation of information as contraventions, which could be prosecuted by means of a contraventions ticket under the Contraventions Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0137 Publication Date: 2023-07-05
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations (Schedule XVIII)
precis: Regulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS (SCHEDULE XVIII) in order to expand the list of offences contained in the Commercial Vehicle Drivers Hours of Service Regulations relating to driving hours, off-duty time between work periods, preparation of reports, or the regular presentation of information as contraventions, which could be prosecuted by means of a contraventions ticket under the Contraventions Act.
